Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 23rd overall pick, by Baltimore in 1973...
Injured on 8/16/1973 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/28/1976 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/8/1977, off Ron Tompkins (CHW)...
Injured on 5/7/1977 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 9/24/1978, off Rick Wise (NYY)...
Injured on 4/7/1985 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/11/1986 to a 3-year deal worth $4,380,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against California on 4/28/1988...
